ingredients.ingredient: 1 (20 ounce) package chocolate sandwich cookies (such as Oreo®), crushed

cookingTips: Melt butter and marshmallows on low heat stirring constantly to prevent burning
Work quickly once marshmallows are melted as the mixture hardens rapidly
Press mixture firmly onto baking sheet and let cool before cutting
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you shape these into clusters versus bars for different serving options?
